# Core Components

Core data stream abstractions that provide the foundation for the contract module.

```python
from aind_behavior_core_analysis.contract.base import DataStream, DataStreamCollection
from aind_behavior_core_analysis.contract.base import DataStreamCollectionBase, FilePathBaseParam
```

::: aind_behavior_core_analysis.contract.base
    handler: python
    selection: True
    members: True
